headline: Insurance Broker at Billyard Insurance Group Inc.
summary:
I like to see my Organisation and Clients succeed in the marketplace and build a valued partnership.I enjoy working with different cultures and am a highly adaptable individual with a proven record in Business Development within Domestic and International Trade Finance

Specialties: Portfolio Management, Commercial Banking, International Trade, Wholesale Risk Management

Skills: Trade Finance, Wholesale Credit & Risk, Sales & Marketing, Product Management,Cross-Cultural Relationships, Corporate Learning and Development,

experiences.title: Insurance Broker
experiences.description: Making Sure to make Insurance (Home, Auto & Commercial)Simple & Easy for You as I believe that you have every right to know & understand where you are spending you hard earned money i.e what you are paying for in Insurance.

experiences.title: Licensed Insurance Advisor
experiences.description: Awesome Customer Experience = Awesome Business Results

experiences.title: Associate Vice President
experiences.description: •Proven track record in portfolio management of SME and Commercial Banking Clients coordinating with multiple stakeholders like GLCM, GTRF & PCM for smooth execution of various transactions & campaigns.•LED the customer acquisition for bank’s international and domestic trade lending vertical. Started acquisition from ground up as the said vertical had USD 1 Million asset book.•ACQUIRED asset book of USD 13 Million during the acquisition phase. This was achieved through new client acquisition by using existing clients’ references, industry database and industry events•BUILT average utilization of 70 %% under the newly acquired asset book through active client servicing, leading to customer consolidation.•COLLABORATED with operations team and product team to improve transaction processing time and customer service.•RETAINED all customers in the portfolio through active client engagement and understanding of their banking needs, resulting in zero exits of relationship•EXHIBITED comprehensive knowledge about credit assessment, banking products, processes, regulations, documentation and compliance requirements

recommendations: Ambitious, creative, and leader are all worlds that come to mind when I think about Arun. I’ve had the pleasure of knowing Arun for 18 months during which I had the privilege of being his sales coach and team leader. Above all, I was always impressed with Arun’s ability to pivot or change course, really embracing change in the fast pace world of Insurance. He is a strong team player who understands the power of diversity however can also stay laser focused and surpass his sales goals and targets. I feel lucky to have had the chance to work with an individual like him. Arun would be a true asset for any team and comes with my heartfelt recommendation.

Arun is an incredibly positive, intelligent, and hard working individual. I had the pleasure of training/mentoring him when he was brand new to the role at RBC and I’ve heard nothing but positive feedback about him from his leaders. Arun has consistently proven to be among the most successful advisors and his outstanding work ethic has set a standard for peers surrounding him. Thank you for all your continued efforts in being a great leader and team player!
